name: 2DShooter Modified
description:
This game is a modified version of the 2D Shooter game. Become a ghostbuster and catch different types of ghosts in a deserted graveyard! Modifications include:

  • Original music for menu screen and in-game
  • New sprites for player and enemies 
  • New animations for enemy and player deaths 
  • New title screen 

Created by Ning Peterson
